name: Aayats
description: Aayats is a ai-powered marketplace that connects recording-artists with music industry professionals streamlining the music production process. We do this with a proprietary ai-model that personalizes and speeds-up the shopping experience 10x.
one_liner: Aayats is a ai-powered marketplace that connects recording-artists with music industry professionals streamlining the music production process. We do this with a proprietary ai-model that personalizes and speeds-up the shopping experience 10x.
